title: ConverZation with Rabbi Pinchas Levin
description:
Rabbi Pinchas Levin is the leader at congregation Anshai Lebowitz in Mequon, Wisconsin. He is a Rav Moreh Hora'ah and taught at the Mir Yeshiva in Jerusalem.

His YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZdP01VeyHabi6r77o4dXZg

Join us on the Discord server. https://discord.gg/xvv6PPSQ
